use block;

drop table decrypt;
drop table log;
drop table log_private;

create table log(
	name varchar(20) primary key,
	publicKey varchar(2048) not null
);

create table log_private(
	name varchar(20) primary key,
	privateKey varchar(2048) not null
);

create table decrypt(
	name varchar(20),
	AES varchar(128) not null,
	RSA varchar(2048) not null,
	PlainText varchar(1024) not null,
	isUsed int not null default 0,
	foreign key(name) references log(name) on delete cascade	
);

insert into log values("server", "");

insert into log_private values("server", "");
